page.title: 13HOMELIFE AT AMALWHIDDEN.
page.content: Gloria Hollow lives in the country so she shops once a week in Penzance or Hayle & daily in Halsetown. She breeds 6 horses & has one riding horse. She also has goats & bullocks. The house is called Amalwhidden & is 350 years old, it has been in the family for a 100 years, she took over 8 years ago. They do some tourism now so they converted all the barns into holiday flats. In the lounge of the house is a 350 year old stove & behind one of the paintings is a time capsule. Her husband is a tin miner in Geevor & provides the family income. There is no public transport available so Mr and Mrs Hollow need two cars to reach their workplace and shops.
